Kedaara close to raising $1.7 bln for India's biggest PE fund, sources sayKedaara Capital is set to raise $1.7 billion for what would be India's biggest-ever private equity fund, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said, highlighting huge interest in the country's fast-growing economy amid a shift away from China. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:51:44 GMT EPGAGNTN7JLL7C5R6Y3PSZTORU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/kedaara-close-raise-17-bln-indias-biggest-pe-fund-sources-say-2024-02-28/M. Sriram世界印度
No change in Indo-Pacific stance under Trump presidency, says Philippine envoyThe United States' Indo-Pacific strategy will unlikely change should Donald Trump win in the presidential race, the Philippines' longtime ambassador to Washington said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:10:05 GMT 47UGGZD4C5NJVOCOM2WT2MKVS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/no-change-indo-pacific-stance-under-trump-presidency-says-philippine-envoy-2024-02-28/Karen Lema世界亚太地区
Hong Kong moves towards enacting tougher security law amid concerns about freedomsA public consultation period for a new Hong Kong national security law closes on Wednesday amid concerns that the legislation, which authorities want to put in place soon, will further erode freedoms in the financial hub. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:48:20 GMT HECLZJSHRBLUXAATZDVBDL5BLU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-moves-towards-enacting-tougher-security-law-amid-concerns-about-2024-02-28/James Pomfret, Jessie Pang世界中国
Bearish demand expectations challenge iron ore's price resilienceIron ore prices, long resilient despite China's gloomy economic outlook, have tumbled since the end of the Lunar New Year holiday, sparking concerns around faltering demand and denting mining stocks in top producer Australia. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:12:27 GMT 6DADYNDB3ZOL5M3CKA7PG3GBBY https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/bearish-demand-expectations-challenge-iron-ores-price-resilience-2024-02-28/Amy Lv, Tony Munroe市场商品
Explainer: Country Garden: How bad are its debt problems?Chinese developer Country Garden said on Wednesday a liquidation petition has been filed against it for non-payment of a $205 million loan, clouding its debt revamp prospects and undermining Beijing's effort to restore confidence in the property sector. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:06:17 GMT X5GS5CSENRLKRKUS6G77242NOA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/country-garden-how-bad-are-its-debt-problems-2024-02-28/Yu Xie世界中国
New Tuvalu government reaffirms relationship with TaiwanTuvalu's new government has reaffirmed its relations with Taiwan after last month's election, Tuvalu's government said in a statement, adding that it wants dialogue with Australia over a security pact signed last year. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 04:51:51 GMT NUUW6MXXIVNKVIVLQ54TCYTRTI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-tuvalu-government-reaffirms-relationship-with-taiwan-2024-02-28/Alasdair Pal, Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
